text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for AAA gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 in the Lenovo Legion Y720 80VR001BUS 15.6" FHD GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-7700HQ 16 GB Memory 1 TB HDD + 128 GB SSD Windows 10 Home VR Ready Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 in the Lenovo Legion Y720 80VR001BUS 15.6" FHD GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-7700HQ 16 GB Memory 1 TB HDD + 128 GB SSD Windows 10 Home VR Ready Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for AAA gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The speakers is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Lenovo Legion Y720 80VR001BUS 15.6" FHD GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-7700HQ 16 GB Memory 1 TB HDD + 128 GB SSD Windows 10 Home VR Ready Gaming Laptop!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Apex Legends and Cyberpunk 2077. The build quality of the Lenovo Legion Y720 80VR001BUS 15.6" FHD GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-7700HQ 16 GB Memory 1 TB HDD + 128 GB SSD Windows 10 Home VR Ready Gaming Laptop is solid, and the speakers is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Fortnite and Starfield. The build quality of the Lenovo Legion Y720 80VR001BUS 15.6" FHD GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-7700HQ 16 GB Memory 1 TB HDD + 128 GB SSD Windows 10 Home VR Ready Gaming Laptop is solid, and the fan noise is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
